title: Advertising
description: The information related to advertising activity in relationship to the experience event.

adViewability.title: MRC viewability
adViewability.description: Media Rating Council (MRC) defines viewability as an online advertising metric that indicates the number of impressions that are actually “seen” by end-users. Viewability captures specific details such as player volume, library version, window status, and viewport ad measured dimensions.

adAssetReference.title: Ad asset reference
adAssetReference.description: Asset information about the ad captured by the experience event.

adAssetViewDetails.title: Ad asset view details
adAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the ad playback captured by the experience event.

completes.title: Completes
completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion but doesn't necessarily mean the end-user watched the whole video as the they could have skipped ahead.

timePlayed.title: Time spent
timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time spent by an end-user on a specific timed media asset.

federated.title: Federated
federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through data federation such as data sharing between customers.

conversions.description: A customer pre-defined action or actions which triggers an event for performance evaluation.

firstQuartiles.description: A digital video ad that has played through 25% of its duration at normal speed.

impressions.description: Impression of an advertisement to a end-user with the potential of being viewed.

midpoints.description: A digital video ad has played through 50% of its duration at normal speed.

starts.description: A digital video ad has started playing.

thirdQuartiles.description: A digital video ad has played through 75% of its duration at normal speed.
